articles.title: Our world may not make it to 2050 - P.M. News
articles.description: In America? The West is running out of water. Lake Mead and Shasta Lake are running dry. They’re projected to hit the breaking point in 2025.
articles.content:
By Umair Haque
Theres a brutal truth that I think were all going to have to contend with. Take a look out there at the world. How do you think things are going?
Europes on fire. Fires stretch from … [+10857 chars]

articles.author: Richard Lawler
articles.title: Chris Evans calls his iPhone 12 Pro too heavy, asks Apple for a home button - The Verge
articles.description: Chris Evans, who has played Captain America and is now starring in a new Netflix flick, The Gray Man, is complaining about his new iPhone 12 Pro. It’s too heavy, and Apple ditched the home button that was on his old iPhone 6S.
articles.content:
Chris Evans as Lloyd Hansen in The Gray Man
Image: Paul Abell/Netflix
Fans of buttons can count on Captain America for support, as Chris Evans notes that even after a few weeks with a newer phone, … [+1682 chars]

articles.title: Monkeypox 'panic' is overblown and failing - New York Post
articles.description: Nostalgic for panic, America? Welcome to monkeypox hysteria!
articles.content:
Nostalgic for panic, America? Welcome to monkeypox hysteria!
